title: Nadine Chahine on Insight Germany
content:
A very illuminative and entertaining interview with Dr. Nadine Chahine, who was a guest at Deutsche Welle's Insight Germany programme.

[http://www.dw.de/insight-germany-lebanese-typographer-nadine-chahine-201...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820114659/http:/www.dw.de/insight-germany-lebanese-typographer-nadine-chahine-2013-07-03/e-16881203-9798 "http://www.dw.de/insight-germany-lebanese-typographer-nadine-chahine-2013-07-03/e-16881203-9798")
author: sevag

comments.content: What a wonderful interview. Congratulations to Nadine for all her achievements. A few years when I was struggling to digitize my AlQuds font she gave me some hints and support. I also learned she was writing her PhD thesis on the legibility of Arabic fonts. Now that she has finished it as she mentions in the interview, I am very interested to read it. Any idea where it can be read?
